result.purpose: Responsible for the configuration, initialization, and dependency injection of the discovery service in the application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, utilizing dependency injection for better separation of concerns and easier testing.

cmd/discovery/config.go.purpose: Defines the configuration structure for the discovery service in the application.

cmd/discovery/main.go.purpose: Initializes and starts the Discovery center application.

cmd/discovery/wire.go.purpose: This file sets up dependency injection for the discovery application using Google Wire.

cmd/discovery/wire_gen.go.purpose: Generates dependency injection code for the discovery application using Wire.
